mapper.select: select a.question_id,q.question_name,answerText,count(answerText) as num from answer a LEFT JOIN question q on q.question_id= a.question_id where a.subQuestion_id is null and option_id is null and a.surver_id=#{surverId} GROUP BY question_id,q.question_name,answerText

select a.question_id,q.question_name,a.option_id,qo.option_content,count(a.option_id) as num from answer a LEFT JOIN question q on q.question_id= a.question_id LEFT JOIN questionoption qo on a.option_id=qo.option_id where ISNULL(a.subQuestion_id) and a.option_id IS NOT NULL and a.surver_id=#{surverId} GROUP BY question_id,q.question_name,a.option_id,qo.option_content
